About

This is a personal project I made with Bootstrap (hence the name booty) with HTML5, CSS, Javascript frontend. The backend is a simple serverless Vercel function as the scope of the project focuses more on the use of AI.

This was made to test and learn about the implmentation of LLMs into a web app. The app utilizes Gemini's free models so please do not spam the chats as I will run out of tokens.

Location

Foosha Village
Goa Kingdom, East Blue

The One Piece is Real

About One Piece Booty

One Piece Booty is a free to use, MIT licensed website created by Start Bootstrap .
